servinfo.title: Sliding (Sun) Roof Assembly Disassembly and Reassembly

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Sliding (Sun) Roof Assembly Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Remove deflector (2) from holder (3) with holding deflector.
Remove No.1 peaces (1) and then pull out sunshade (2) from guide rails (3).
Remove rail stoppers (4) from guide rails.
Pull out drip channel (1), panel brackets (2), shoes (3) and drive cables (4) all together from guide rails.
Disassemble drip channel, panel brackets, shoes and drive cables.
Remove guide block (1) and housing covers (2) from rails.

servinfosub.title: Reassembly
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse disassembly procedure for reassembly, noting the following.

item.ptxt: Check wear and damage of drive cables and sliding roof motor gear.
Slide shoes (1) to contact guide blocks (2) for positioning the sliding roof to tilt up position and install sliding roof motor.
